lines.text: Mr. Anthony, I have a problem!

Good morning, Pig-&-Duck-Nip-n-Tuck Delivery Service. Yes, madam, your baby's on the way, yesirree. Parcel post. Good morning? I'm sorry, Bing, you've used up your quota. Hello? Oh yes, Mr. Cantor. You say you haven't got that boy yet? Well, if at first you don't succeed...
[laughs and goes to a long-distance phone]
Hello? Oh, Mr. Dione. What? Mr. Dione, *please*. Hello? Yes, I know all deliveries are late. Oh, yeah? Well you're another! Hello? Sorry but... *quiet*!
[the phones stop ringing. Daffy sighs with relief]
I'm only three and a half seconds old.
Gosh. Here's an egg w-without an address. D-D-Daffy!
This egg has no address. You'll have to sit on it and hatch it out to see who it b-belongs to.
Yes, I'll have to sit on it, and... Oh, no! Oh-ho, no! Sitting on eggs is out. O-W-T out.
I do all da woik, and da faddahs get all da credit!
